budurajanan wahanse meththanisansha suthrayedi deshana kale,dewiwaru apa aaraksha karanawa kiyalayi.dewiwaru kiyanne apa wagema bala sampanna wuna aya.dewiyo kiyanne apage sewakayo,wadakarayo nemeyi kiyana deya budu himiyan deshana karanawa.ee aya maha pin karala usas thaththwayata pathwunu pirisak.ee aya hama witekama balaporoththu wenne,yahapath sithiwili athi minisun.ewani minisun dewiyo hama witekama aaraksha karanawa.lokuwata puja wattiyak dila ,dewiyo puja wattiya nisa apa diha balayi kiyala kawuru hari hithanawa nam,eeka maha manmula wimak.dewalayakata gihin puja wattiyak thiyanna kalin aduma ganane pansilwath samadan wela silwathek,gunawathek wenna oona.thawakalika gunawathek bawata nemeyi,mage me jiwithaya an janathawata hithasuwa pinisama ya kiyana manushika hangima apa thula athi wunoth thamayi dewiyo api diha balanne.me wishwaye saba dewiyo innawa.eya sabawak.sathyayak.budu hamuduruwo madiyam kisa (ra dolahen pasuwa) wen kale dewiyanta bana kiyanna.minisun pamanak nemeyi, dewiyanuth bana ahanna kamathiyi.api sucharithawathwa wada kaloth,dewiyo witharak nemeyi,sobadahama pawa apa aaraksha karanawa.pararthacharyawe yede‡∑ä nam,ee pudgalaya awi aayudhawalin,gindaren,sobadahame wipathwalin aaraksha wenawa.
